config.name: Variable Name
config.label: Variable Name
config.helper: A variable name is a symbolic name to reference information.

config.label: Label
config.helper: The label describes the field's name

config.label: Placeholder Text
config.helper: The placeholder is what is shown in the field when no value is provided yet

config.label: Validation Rules
config.helper: The validation rules needed for this field

config.label: Helper Text
config.helper: Help text is meant to provide additional guidance on the field's value

config.label: Text Color
config.helper: Set the element's text color

config.label: Background Color
config.helper: Set the element's background color

config.label: Default Value
config.helper: The default value is pre populated using the existing request data. This feature will allow you to modify the value displayed on screen load if needed.

config.label: Visibility Rule
config.helper: This control is hidden until this expression is true

config.label: Custom Format String
config.helper:
Use the Mask Pattern format
Date ##/##/####
SSN ###-##-####
Phone (###) ###-####

config.label: CSS Selector Name
config.helper: Use this in your custom css rules

config.label: Aria Label
config.helper: Attribute designed to help assistive technology (e.g. screen readers) attach a label

config.label: Tab Order
config.helper: Order in which a user will move focus from one control to another by pressing the Tab key
